eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.listeners

Class PlayerAmbientListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.listeners.PlayerAmbientListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class PlayerAmbientListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    A listener to catch events, related to interactions between the environment and the player.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

      • onWorldInit

        public void onWorldInit(org.bukkit.event.world.WorldInitEvent event)
        Prevents that the spawn is loaded if a new world is initialized. This prevents lag on entering instances.
        Parameters:
        event -

      • onWorldEnter

        public void onWorldEnter(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerChangedWorldEvent event)
        Reloads most custom UI if the player changes their current world. This assures that the correct scoreboard, minimap etc. are shown. Also checks for a new music track.
        Parameters:
        event -
